effect.short: Drains 75% of the damage inflicted to heal the user.
effect.full: Deals regular damage.  Drains 75% of the damage inflicted to heal the user.

flavorTexts.text:
The user steals the target’s HP with a kiss. The
user’s HP is restored by over half of the damage
taken by the target.

user’s HP is restored by over half of the damage
taken by the target.

The user steals the target’s energy with a kiss.
The user’s HP is restored by over half
of the damage taken by the target.
